name: DHP_Emily_Chaise_Lounger
reviews: I love this chaise! It is perfect for my office! I wasn't crazy about the chrome legs, so my husband attached wooden legs from Home Depot and it looks great! Very nice for the price!

I haven't found anything wrong with this Chaise Lounger as of yet and I've had it at least half a year. It's not really good for over-night sleeping and it's not really meant for that. Doesn't take up much space and it's great for naps..

We ordered 2 of these to use in our camper to replace the platform bed. They are exactly what we were looking for. They were delivered much quicker than anticipated and in great shape when they arrived. The quality is also better than I anticipated for the price!

I purchased this for a corner by the fireplace, opposite a mid-century chair. The chaise looks nice and the comfort level is decent. No, it's not super cushy, but I wouldn't expert that from any modern, faux leather furniture. By adding a small pillow and a plush throw, it's cozy enough. I expect the cushions will soften a little over time, but can't verify this because we've only used it a short while. The 'leather' is a matte finish and looks fine. However, be aware - the chaise is designed to hook onto a matching futon - so there are velcro straps underneath (which you can roll up to mostly disguise) and a section on the lower sides that is not fully finished, has black fabric instead of the leather. On the black chaise, this isn't glaringly obvious, but on the off white version, it could be. Be sure to zoom in on the photos and check this out, so you know what to expect. Easy to recline, pretty easy to assemble. Construction seems sturdy and front legs are substantial. Being low to the ground, it's easy for a child or pet to join you for a little lounge. Overall, would recommend so long as one is aware of the limitations.
The price is great. The shipment was good. The chaise lounger was easy to put together. I only had this chaise lounger for a few week. So far its okay.
This chaise is a bargain. Easy to assemble the legs, very comfortable. Some of the seams are a little rough, but for the price, it's terrific.
description: The multi-position back features Click Clack technology, whichquickly converts the chaise from lounger to sleeper. Spaciousenough to lounge comfortably alone, or pair it with the EmilyConvertible futon (sold separately), and get a sectional sofa or anextra large sleeping surface for overnight guests.Includes: One (1) futonModern look and designFaux leather upholsteryQuickly converts from chaise to sleeperSurface wipes clean with a damp clothPair it with the Emily Convertible futon (sold  separately)Chrome metal legsWeight limit is 350 poundsMaterials: Faux leatherFinish: ChromeUpholstery color: Black or vanillaUpholstery fill: FoamWeight: 54 pounds       Thickness: 7 inchSeat dimensions: 19.7 inches high x 50.4 inches wide x 30  inches deepSleeping dimensions: 15.5 inches high x 70 inches wide x 30  inches deepDimensions (overall): 32 inches high x 61.5 inches wide x 30  inches deepFurniture Pattern: SolidFurniture Room: Bedroom, Living Room, OfficeType: Futon Set, Futon ChairMaterial: Foam, Chrome, Faux LeatherStyle:  modern, Transitional       Exact Color: Black, CreamColor: Black, CreamSize: TwinStyleModern, TransitionalMaterialChrome, Faux Leather, FoamTypeFuton Chair, Futon SetThickness7 InchAssemblyAssembly RequiredColorBlack, CreamFurniture PatternSolid
